articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Kim Jong Il from Seychellois President 
    Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, received a message of sympathy from James Alix Michel, president of Seychelles, on April 23 as regards the explosion of wagons in the DPRK.
 The president expressed sincere sympathy and condolences to Kim Jong Il and to the DPRK government and people and the bereaved families of the victims in the name of the government and people of the Republic of Seychelles and affirmed their firm solidarity.

articles.title: Greetings to South African President
Chongryon Calls for Mass Assistance Movement
articles.content:
Greetings to South African President 
    Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of greetings to South African President Thabo Mbuyelwa Mbeki on April 24 on the occasion of the national day of the country.
 The message noted that over the last decade since the proclamation of the first democratic state after the abolition of the age-old apartheid in South Africa, the government and the people of South Africa have made great successes in their efforts for the national unity and economic development of the country.    
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the president and the government of South Africa greater success in their work for the stability and prosperity of the country and the peace in the region.

articles.title: Latvian President Refers to Korean Issue
articles.content:
Chongryon Calls for Mass Assistance Movement 
    Tokyo, April 27 (KNS-KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) appealed to all the officials of Chongryon organizations at all levels and Koreans in Japan to conduct a mass assistance movement with warm compatriotism to help inhabitants in Ryongchon County, North Phyongan Province, recover from the damage caused by an explosion at Ryongchon Railway Station and lead a stable life at an early date.
 The committee decided to conduct a fund-raising campaign at all branches and headquarters of Chongryon and called upon broad strata of Koreans to participate in the campaign.

articles.title: S. Korean Research Worker Calls for Building Structure of Korea-U.S. Confrontation
articles.content:
Latvian President Refers to Korean Issue 
    Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- New DPRK Ambassador Jon In Chan presented his credentials to Latvian President Vaira Vike Freiberga on April 20.
 On the occasion the president hoped that the nuclear issue of the Korean peninsula would be settled in a diplomatic and peaceful way and successes achieved in the economic development and external relations of the DPRK.    
 Referring to peace and reconciliation process between the north and south of Korea, the president expressed sympathy with it and laid stress on developing relations with the DPRK.

articles.content:
Cooperation Plan Signed between DPRK and Vietnam
    Pyongyang, April 27 (KCNA) -- A 2004 plan for cooperation in the field of standardization, measurement and management of quality between the State Bureau for Quality Control of the DPRK and the Directorate for Standards and Quality of Vietnam was signed here today.
 Present at the ceremony were Kim Hyong Chol, director of the state bureau, and officials concerned from the DPRK side and members of the delegation of the Directorate for Standards and Quality of Vietnam led by Director General Ngo Quy Viet and Vietnamese Ambassador here Phan Trong Thai from the Vietnamese side.
